section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This chapter may be cited as the “Off-Label Informed Consent Act of 2008”.

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of Authority pursuant to D.C. Law 17-131, the SafeRX Amendment Act of 2008, see Mayor’s Order 2008-94, July 3, 2008 ( 55 DCR 9375).
